backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four completed features for replacing teacher profile placeholder images with actual uploaded photos and rendering them as static assets in the Teachers component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing the structure and functionality of the Brilliant Coaching Centre website including Hero, About, Courses, Teachers, Gallery, Contact, and supporting components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining the design system for the coaching centre website with gold, maroon, and neutral color schemes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, and title 'Brilliant Coaching Centre Website'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the entire application in LanguageProvider and renders all page sections (Hero, About, Courses, WhyChooseUs, Teachers, Gallery, AdmissionForm, Contact, Footer) plus LanguageToggle and FloatingWhatsApp components.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Us section component displaying four feature cards (Concept Clarity, Personal Care, Discipline, Exam Preparation) with icons, bilingual content, and hover animations in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionForm.ts: Admission enquiry form component with fields for student name, class, subject, and mobile number that validates input and sends a formatted WhatsApp message to +91 98834 48350 with toast notifications for user feedback.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying three contact methods (Address, Phone, WhatsApp) in card layout with clickable actions and a map placeholder, all with bilingual support and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays three course offerings (LKG-IV, V-X, XI-XII) with bilingual support, showing class levels, subjects, and descriptions in a responsive card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button in the bottom-right corner that opens a chat with a pre-filled message in the user's selected language.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer with logo watermark, contact information, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with bilingual text support.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Shows a photo gallery grid with lightbox dialog for full-screen viewing, including navigation controls and bilingual captions for classroom and event images.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring the coaching center logo, bilingual name and tagline (Education, Discipline, Success), and a WhatsApp CTA button with animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Fixed top-right button that toggles between English and Bengali languages, displaying the opposite language name as the button label.
frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx: Displays three teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da, Santanu Sir) with photos, classes taught, subjects, experience, and teaching focus in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Showcases five key benefits (experienced teachers, small batches, regular tests, friendly environment, affordable fees) with icons and bilingual descriptions in a card grid.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider for bilingual language switching (English/Bengali) with session storage persistence and a translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages ICP backend actor instances, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark theme using gold/yellow and maroon color scheme, custom animations (fade-in, scroll, gradient), and OKLCH color space variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system (gold, maroon, dark backgrounds), typography, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a bilingual coaching centre website with WhatsApp integration, photo gallery, admission forms, and brand-specific styling (gold/maroon theme), including image processing requirements for teacher portraits.
